name: pawel-brzezinski/cqrs-component
description: Provides helpful classes and objects for the CQRS architecture.

suggest.ext-sodium: Needs to use Sodium hash value object
suggest.broadway/broadway: Needed to use Broadway buses and handlers
suggest.doctrine/dbal: Needed to use Doctrine DBAL types based on domain value objects
suggest.symfony/amqp-messenger: Needed to use Messenger buses and handlers (with AMQP)
suggest.symfony/console: Needed to use Symfony event subscribers
suggest.symfony/framework-bundle: Needed to use controller abstrtacts for Symfony framework
suggest.symfony/messenger: Needed to use Messenger buses and handlers (without AMQP)
suggest.symfony/password-hasher: Needed to use password hashers based on hash value objects
